CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Asset_Class__c , 'Solar PV') , 'DC', IF( ISPICKVAL( Asset_Class__c , 'Wind') , 'AC', IF( ISPICKVAL( Asset_Class__c , 'Hydro') , 'AC', IF( ISPICKVAL( Asset_Class__c , 'Storage') , 'DC', IF( ISPICKVAL( Asset_Class__c , 'Other Renewable') , 'AC', IF( ISPICKVAL( Asset_Class__c , 'Industrial' ) , ' ', null ))))))
CustomField.label: MWp
